channel.title: [Need A TEAM]
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Welcome to redemptionscape![/size] Hello, i am currently hosting a server [317] with a guy who is a bad coder and has no respect. I have this server online for proof i can host i'm not a coder i know the basics but the rest confuses me. So some stuff about me i am currently 17 jr in highschool next year i failed a grade before thats why im going to be a jr, i have a amazing girlfriend we are 9months apart and been dating for about a year and a half every saturday we hang out but i can leave the server on. Im about to start my bank account to be able to buy vps soon. and now ill tell you some goals for the server [size=18pt]GOALS[/size] Alright so here are the basic goals : to have a server i can call "its our work" basically not just leech. to make a server none has seen before to work hard and have it pay off. to make it fun to play and make so theres something players can always do. so those are basic goals atm. now for what im looking for all together. [size=18pt]What i need for this server.[/size] So what i need is: A good coder with atleast a year of coding and knows whats hes doing. I need a web designer to design our website.
[size=24pt]For right now this is all i need to get the server running for once heres the questions i want the coder to answer or websigner:[/size] CODER: How old are you:
How long have you coded; give me some things you've coder:
What type of person are you, get mad fast, always happy, ext.:
Do you understand its not just me or you its US:
Any question or comments add here:
Web designer: How long have you been doing this for:
Show me some website you've done:
Can you also make Banners and such:
Add any extra info or comments here:

item.title: [Need A TEAM]
item.dc:creator: @Promenthium Promenthium
item.description:
@Promenthium wrote:

Hi,
if we can rename server i’m in
i got a .com site
know alot of webdesign,
i got a vps + 1,5 years 317 coding experience

grtz Jonas

Read full topic

item.title: [Need A TEAM]
item.dc:creator: @OBEYxChronik OBEYxChronik
item.description:
@OBEYxChronik wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:509318”]with a thread like this you’ll end up getting people who have no clue what they’re doing

professionalism will get you better developers[/quote]

I Find myself quoting Clawz multiple times today, haha. But seriously he’s right, have a more complex process of finding your staff, you could end up with a coder just like the first.

Read full topic

Lol if you focus u can rewrite a skill in a day or two, but nothing like 2 hours
OT: message me ur Skype so we can talk about dis

item.title: [Need A TEAM]
item.dc:creator: @godog godog
item.description:
@godog wrote:

[size=24pt]Welcome to redemptionscape![/size]
Hello, i am currently hosting a server [317] with a guy who is a bad coder and has no respect. I have this server online for proof i can host i’m not a coder i know the basics but the rest confuses me. So some stuff about me i am currently 17 jr in highschool next year i failed a grade before thats why im going to be a jr, i have a amazing girlfriend we are 9months apart and been dating for about a year and a half every saturday we hang out but i can leave the server on. Im about to start my bank account to be able to buy vps soon. and now ill tell you some goals for the server
[size=18pt]GOALS[/size]
Alright so here are the basic goals :
to have a server i can call “its our work” basically not just leech.
to make a server none has seen before to work hard and have it pay off.
to make it fun to play and make so theres something players can always do.
so those are basic goals atm. now for what im looking for all together.
[size=18pt]What i need for this server.[/size]
So what i need is:
A good coder with atleast a year of coding and knows whats hes doing.
I need a web designer to design our website.

[size=24pt]For right now this is all i need to get the server running for once heres the questions i want the coder to answer or websigner:[/size]
CODER:
How old are you:

How long have you coded; give me some things you’ve coder:

What type of person are you, get mad fast, always happy, ext.:

Do you understand its not just me or you its US:

Any question or comments add here:

Web designer:
How long have you been doing this for:

Show me some website you’ve done:

Can you also make Banners and such:

Add any extra info or comments here:
